So here is my first attempt at a Fan fic for KSP. Here is a brief Discripiton

The Loki Programs Mun missions were the Height of Scientific and Technological advancement. But after problems with the rocket caused the program to go on Hiatus the Kerman Government granted the KSC to continue under certon conditions. As the Crew of Loki IV goes to the Mun and back, they face challanges that should not be. Will they make it back alive?

I will post the first chapter here, and see what everyone thinks. Then I will go from there. It isn't the best, and my Grammar and Spelling skills make Dyslexic people cry. But if you insist to see it. Here it is.
